title: Explicit Failure for errors caught when running concurrent tasks in parallel state
description: This workflow demonstrates an explicit failure when running concurrent tasks in Parallel state.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This workflow demonstrates an explicit failure when running concurrent tasks in Parallel state.
The objective is to mark the execution as a failure whenever a branch encounters an error while also ensuring all branches within the Parallel state completes.
